GapFillInput.Title: Revision of question forms
GapFillInput.Instruction: Read the answers and use the words in bold to help you make the questions. Type the questions in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Where do you live?
I live in Henry Street.
2. Why are you here?
I'm here because I want to talk to you.
3. When do you finish work|What time do you finish work?
I finish work at five o'clock.
4. How often do you go swimming?
I go swimming about three times a week.
5. What's your father's name?
My father's name is Ivan.
6. Which hand is it in|Where is it?
It's in your left hand.
7. How many brothers have you got|How many brothers do you have?
I've got three brothers.
8. How long is the film|How long does the film last?
The film's one and a half hours.
9. What kind of car is it|What type of car is it?
It's a Mercedes.
10. How are your parents?
My parents are very well, thank you.
